channel.title: Making a client connect to a ip and port auto
channel.description:
ok i know how to emove the enter ip here thing but i want to knwo how it automaticly conencts to kevinscape.zapto.org and on port 43594 (gonna change port later..so they msut use my client thaport will be secret) how do i do it i got an open source client with no errors i just want it to connect to my ip and port
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ can anyone just help me or give a tutorial
